name: Existence: The Outer Reach
description:
Existence puts you in command of an empire that is expanding across the galaxy. Colonize planets by building bases and extracting valuable resources to build your forces. Attack enemy camps to control the planet.

Existence is a blend of 4X and RTS elements that focuses on planetary expansion through building bases and colonizing planets. Expanding to other planets requires a star fleet to move your units and destroy enemy star fleets in your way.

Capture Native Wildlife

Discover native wildlife on planets and capture them to fight with you. Lead your forces into battle with a large Urcerus that was brought in from planet Nusakan.

Still Under Development!

The following functionality is still in development:

  • Resources and crafting - I still haven't figured out how I want to balance the resource and crafting costs
  • Colonization in space, including ship building - resources are not available to build the space station
  • Traveling to other planets - No starships means no traveling to other planets yet
  • Audio
  • AI
  • ...pretty much everything at this time
